description: G.A.T. Amarasekara Vs. Hon. Attorney General - Hon. A.H.M.D. Nawaz, J - Sentencing policy-Absence of requisite provIsIons to deal with a deranged appellant UK provisions-Necessity to amend CPC before Section 7 of CPC
